---
author: 'Matthew Lee'
date: 'July 2021' # Month and year of submission
title: "I made this template based on thesisdown to comply with the University of Bristol regulations"
university: "University of Bristol"
faculty: "Health Sciences"
school: "Bristol Medical School"
group: "MRC Integrative Epidemiologu Unit"
degree: "Population Health Sciences"
wordcount: "70,455"
logo: data/index/UoBcrest.pdf # remove for no logo
bibliography: bib/thesis.bib # location of your bibliography file
csl: csl/nature.csl # location of your referencing style file
knit: "bookdown::render_book"
site: "bookdown::bookdown_site"
header-includes:
    \usepackage[left]{lineno}
    \usepackage{float}
    \floatplacement{figure}{H}
    \raggedbottom 
output: 
    thesisdown::thesis_pdf: 
      toc: true
      toc-depth: 2 # how many levels in your table of contents
      latex_engine: pdflatex
lot: true # list of tables
lof: true # list of figures
space_betwee_paragraphs: true
indent: true # do you want to indent paragraphs
fig_caption: true
always_allow_html: yes
link-citations: true
abstract: |
  `r if(knitr:::is_latex_output()) paste(readLines("00-abstract.Rmd"), collapse = '\n  ')`
acknowledgements: |
  `r if(knitr:::is_latex_output()) paste(readLines("00-acknowledgements.Rmd"), collapse = '\n  ')`
publications: |
  `r if(knitr:::is_latex_output()) paste(readLines("00-publications.Rmd"), collapse = '\n  ')`
outline: |
  `r if(knitr:::is_latex_output()) paste(readLines("00-outline.Rmd"), collapse = '\n  ')`
contributions: |
  `r if(knitr:::is_latex_output()) paste(readLines("00-contributions.Rmd"), collapse = '\n  ')`
declaration: |
  `r if(knitr:::is_latex_output()) paste(readLines("00-declaration.Rmd"), collapse = '\n  ')`
abbreviations: |
  `r if(knitr:::is_latex_output()) paste(readLines("00-abbreviations.Rmd"), collapse = '\n  ')`
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
---
